text: Lalle ne, waɗanda mala'iku* suka karɓi rayukansu, (alhali) suna masu zaluntar kansu, sun ce (musu): "A cikin me kuka kasance?" (Su kuma) suka ce: "Mun kasance waɗanda aka raunana a cikin ƙasa." Suka ce: "Ashe ƙasar Allah ba ta kasance mayalwaciya ba, domin ku yi hijira a cikinta?" To, waɗannan makomarsu Jahannama ce. Kuma ta munana ta zama makoma
